title: Integrated Education on Power Electronics Design Simulation and Clicker-Based Formative Assessment (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic electronic engineering theory and circuit analysis skills
context.additional_context: Project Evaluation Linked to Field Practice Using Smartphone-Based Clicker Systems

learning_goals: Through power converter design simulation, over 85% of learners can apply efficiency optimization techniques.
Clicker-based formative assessment enables 100% of learners to improve their ability to correct conceptual errors based on real-time feedback.
In a VR environment, learners can simulate and explain the operating principles of three or more power electronic components.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
